metadata.title: International Journal for Research Trends and Innovation (www.ijrti.org)
metadata.abstract: - It is the science and engineering of making intelligent machines, especially intelligent computer programs. It is related to the similar task of using computers to understand human intelligence, but AI does not have to confine itself to methods that are biologically observable. While no consensual definition of Artificial Intelligence (AI) exists, AI is broadly characterized as the study of computations that allow for perception, reason and action. Today, the amount of data that is generated, by both humans and machines, far outpaces humans’ ability to absorb, interpret, and make complex decisions based on that data. Artificial intelligence forms the basis for all computer learning and is the future of all complex decision making. This paper examines features of artificial Intelligence, introduction, definitions of AI, history, applications, growth and achievements.
keywords: Natural Language Processing and Knowledge Base System

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content:
Till now we have discussed in brief about Artificial Intelligence. We have discussed some of its principles, its applications, its 
achievements etc.The ultimate goal of institutions and scientists working on AI is to solve majority of the problems or to achieve 
the tasks which we humans directly can’t accomplish. It is for sure that development in this field of computer science will change 
the complete scenario of the world Now it is the responsibility of creamy layer of engineers to develop this field.

INTRODUCTION- | None | None | None | None | None | None | None
Artificial Intelligence ( AI ) is the branch of computer science which deals with intelligence of machines where an intelligent agent
is a system that takes actions which maximize its chances of success. It is the study of ideas which enable computers to do the things
that make people seem intelligent. The central principles of AI include such as reasoning, knowledge, planning, learning,
communication, perception and the ability to move and manipulate objects. It is the science and engineering of making intelligent
machines, especially intelligent computer programs

| None | SOME OTHER APPLICATIONS: | None | None
None | None |  | None | None
1. Fraud detection. The financial services industry uses artificial intelligence in two ways. Initial scoring of applications for | None | None | None | None
credit uses AI to understand creditworthiness. More advanced AI engines are employed to monitor and detect fraudulent | None | None | None | None
payment card transactions in real time. | None | None | None | None
2. Virtual customer assistance (VCA). Call centers use VCA to predict and respond to customer inquiries outside of human | None | None | None | None
interaction. Voice recognition, coupled with simulated human dialog, is the first point of interaction in a customer service | None | None | None | None
inquiry. Higher-level inquiries are redirected to a human. | None | None | None | None
3. Medicine: A medical clinic can use AI systems to organize bed schedules, make a staff rotation, and provide medical | None | None | None | None
information. AI has also application in fields of cardiology (CRG), neurology (MRI), embryology (sonography), complex | None | None | None | None
operations of internal organs etc. | None | None | None | None
4. Heavy Industries : Huge machines involve risk in their manual maintenance and working. So in becomes necessary part to | None | None | None | None
have an efficient and safe operation agent in their operation. | None | None | None | None
5. Telecommunications: Many telecommunications companies make use of heuristic search in the management of their | None | None | None | None
workforcesfor example BT Group has deployed heuristic search in a scheduling application that provides the work schedules | None | None | None | None
of 20000 engineers. | None | None | None | None
6. Music: Scientists are trying to make the computer emulate the activities of the skillful musician. Composition, performance, | None | None | None | None
music theory, sound processing are some of the major areas on which research in Music and Artificial Intelligence are | None | None | None | None
focusing on. Eg:chucks, Orchextra, smartmusic etc. | None | None | None | None
7. Antivirus: Artificial intelligence (AI) techniques have played increasingly important role in antivirus detection. At present, | None | None | None | None
some principal artificial intelligence techniques applied in antivirus detection It improves the performance of antivirus | None | None | None | None
detection systems, and promotes the production of new artificial intelligence algorithm and the application in antivirus | None | None | None | None
detection to integrate antivirus detection with artificial intelligence. | None | None | None | None

 | Future of AI | None | None | None
None |  | None | None | None
None | Looking at the features and its wide application we may definitely stick to artificial intelligence. Seeing at the development | None | None | None
None | of AI, is it that the future world is becoming artificial. Biological intelligence is fixed, because it is an old, mature paradigm, | None | None | None
None | but the new paradigm of non-biological computation and intelligence is growing exponentially. The memory capacity of the | None | None | None
None | human brain is probably of the order of ten thousand million binary digits. But most of this is probably used in remembering | None | None | None
None | visual impressions, and other comparatively wasteful ways . Hence we can say that as natural intelligence is limited and | None | None | None
None | volatile too world may now depend upon computers for smooth working.A | None | None | rtificial intelligence (AI) is truly a revolutionary
None | feat of computer science, set to become a core component of all modern software over the coming years and decades. This | None | None | None
None | presents a threat but also an opportunity. AI will be deployed to augment both defensive and offensive cyber operations. | None | None | None
None | Additionally, new means of cyber attack will be invented to take advantage of the particular weaknesses of AI technology. | None | None | None
None | Finally, the importance of data will be amplified by AI’s appetite for large amounts of training data, redefining how we must | None | None | None
None | think about data protection. Prudent governance at the global level will be essential to ensure that this era-defining | None | None | None
None | technology will bring about broadly shared safety and prosperity. | None |  | None
